Class CcddCopyTableHandler

    • Method Detail

      • createCopyTable

        protected java.lang.String[][] createCopyTable(CcddLinkHandler linkHandler,
                                               java.lang.String dataStreamName,
                                               int headerSize,
                                               java.lang.String messageIDNameField,
                                               CcddClassesComponent.ArrayListMultiple tlmMessageIDs,
                                               boolean optimize,
                                               boolean expandMacros)
        Create a copy table based on the message definitions
        Parameters:
        linkHandler - link handler reference
        dataStreamName - data stream name
        headerSize - size of the packet header in bytes
        messageIDNameField - name of the structure table data field containing the message ID name. If provided this is used instead of the tlmMessageIDs list
        tlmMessageIDs - list containing string array entries giving the structure table path+name and the table's associated message ID name. Used if messageIDNameField is null
        optimize - true to create copy table with memory copies optimized
        expandMacros - true to expand any macro within the variable names
        Returns:
        Array containing the copy table entries

      • getTelemetryMessageIDs

        protected java.lang.String[][] getTelemetryMessageIDs(java.lang.String streamName)
        Get the messages ID names and their corresponding ID values for the specified data stream
        Parameters:
        streamName - data stream name
        Returns:
        String array containing the message ID names and ID values; returns blank if there are no entries for the specified data stream or if data stream name is invalid

      • getStoredMessages

        private java.util.List<CcddClassesDataTable.Message> getStoredMessages(java.lang.String streamName)
        Get messages for the specified rate from the project database
        Parameters:
        streamName - data stream name
        Returns:
        List of messages for the specified rate
